title: You should be able to report people from champ select
body:
I've been in too many queues where some random toxic player forces people who want to actually play the game to dodge because they threaten, for example, taking Soraka with smite and cleanse adc. Just immediately, without hesitation, blackmailing people into losing LP.

I just feel like there should be some way we're a team can vote to dodge in champ select/ report someone if this stuff starts happening.

EDIT: not sure I made this entirely clear, but the guy in question wasn't just playing some new strat for fun. He was threatening to play something he knew was dumb and intentionally lose us the game just so someone would dodge.

I agree with this 100% the amount of trolls that you get are incredible these days i'm at least getting 1 a game now.

I don't play ranked, but I have come across these types of people in Normals and ARAM. 

My usual response is to tell them to dodge if they want out. If they don't want to dodge, I say something along the lines of 

"You can either dodge and wait 15 minutes for a game, or you can play this game,which will probably be 30 - 45 minutes long."

And hey, if they want to troll, great! They have to wait 30 - 45 minutes to play the other game.

I know it's not a significant consolation in ranked, but you have just made a troll waste their own time for being a giant douche.

If you have screenshots I would consider [submitting a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I agree that it's frustrating that you don't have the opportunity to report people like this.

If you do end up in a game with them, the best way is of course still to report them in post game (and mention in the notes whatever might have happened in pre/post game). Of course, if someone dodges then that isn't a possibility, so that's when you should consider submitting a support ticket.

Support are very busy however, so if it's something minor I probably wouldn't submit a ticket about it (I wouldn't call the example you gave minor, especially if there is chat to back it up). 

It's also worth noting that you won't get any satisfying response back, because due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

Sadly I didn't even think to get a screenshot. Instead I just posted this immediately because I honestly wasn't even aware you could report people through support tickets. If it happens again I certainly will. 

Thanks for the help. :)
No worries and good luck on the Rift :)

Hello again,

I don't see any reason why would we ever do that to you. As my colleague mentioned earlier, we can't foresee if a player is going to troll or feed or AFK. There is no such technology for that.

As for AFK's, our automatic LeaverBuster system is implemented to discourage Summoners from repeatedly leaving matches and/or idling during gameplay. Suspensions and punishments are issued against Summoners that leave or idle in several games over a relatively short period of time. The LeaverBuster system bans chronic leavers and tracks and punishes users who continually leave their Teams.

You can find more about LeaverBuster in our Knowledge Base:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714

On the other hand, can you provide me an evidence that you were matched with Challenger/Gold/Silver players?

Lastly, we don't disclose information about a player's sanction due to privacy.

I think that if you aspire to get better, you should try to focus on what aspects of your own game you can improve rather than externalizing blame on the system and on your teammates.If you want to climb, focus on yourself. Tens of thousands of other players can do it and you know you can as well. Recognize that the first step starts with you!

MaggieNoodle
Riot Games Player Support
